status: draft
shortDescription: "One can assign to the variable of an enhanced for statement to store a value in the corresponding array or collection element"
shortCorrection: "The variable of an enhanced for statement contains a copy of the value of the corresponding array or collection element"

  - Variable
  - Array

  - id: jls21

---

The variable in an enhanced for statement (also know as a for-each loop)
corresponds to an element of the array or collection the loop iterates over.
Thus one can assign to that variable to update the array or collection.

frontmatter.shortDescription: One can assign to the variable of an enhanced for statement to store a value in the corresponding array or collection element
frontmatter.shortCorrection: The variable of an enhanced for statement contains a copy of the value of the corresponding array or collection element
